# Object functions

## Typing

```{r}
x <- 1
class(x)
typeof(x)
str(x)

x <- c(1,2,3)
class(x)
typeof(x)
str(x)

x <- c("a","b")
class(x)
typeof(x)
str(x)

x <- list(a=1,b=2)
class(x)
typeof(x)
str(x)

x <- data.frame(a=1,b=2)
class(x)
typeof(x)
str(x)
```

## Object dimensions

```{r}
df <- data.frame(a=c(1,2,3),b=c(2,3,4))
m1 <- matrix(c(1,2,3,2,3,4,3,4,5),ncol = 3)
a1 <- array(1:48,dim = c(2,8,3))
dim(df)
dim(m1)
dim(a1)
ncol(df)
nrow(df)
ncol(m1)
nrow(m1)
ncol(a1)
nrow(a1)
```
